text: Rowland Evans (April 28, 1921 - March 23, 2001) was a conservative Chicago Sun-Times columnist and co-host of the Cable News Network's (CNN) Evans & Novak, later Evans, Novak, Hunt, & Shields.Tim Brooks & E. Marsh, The Complete Directory to Prime Time Network and Cable TV Shows 1946-present page 427 He was also a political analyst for CNN, along with his partner on Evans and Novak and at the Chicago Sun Times, Robert Novak.Networks will call races only after the polls close United Press International October 30, 1986 ==References== Category:1921 births Category:2001 deaths Category:American journalists Category:American television news anchors Category:American political commentators Category:Deaths from esophageal cancer Category:CNN people
title: Rowland Evans
